Summary: moonlike light moved towards us, then hovered over trees; suddenly disappeared when we approached it to; no sound at all. Reappeared following night, same time; crossed road in front of car that time.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were driving on an unlighted wooded road near the Ipswich River on way to Hamilton from Rowley after midnight, returning from work. We both spotted a large,white sphere of light coming towards the road from the left. We never heard of flying saucers or UFOs at that time. At first we thought a plane was crashing. But then the light stopped just above the trees in front and to the left of the road. so we thought it was a helicopter, until we realized it made no sound. We weren't afraid, just curious, so we both got out of the car and began to walk towards it. It disappeared. I have no recollection of its zooming off, even. The following night, about a half hour later at night, my friend was returing from Hamilton. At approximately the same spot, a similar (same?) sphere of light zoomed across the road in front of the car, he told me. I wasn't there that time. We told our friends and family only, not for fear of ridicule, just because it never occurred to us to call the police or the newspaper.
